data.question: What is the empirical formula of UiO(bpdc)?
What is the calculated BET surface area of UiO(bpdc)?
At what temperature was the single-crystal X-ray diffraction data for UiO(bpdc) collected?
What is the uptake ratio of D2 versus H2 at 77 K?
data.answer: The uptake ratio of D2 to H2 shows an increasing trend with the decreasing pressure and reaches a maximum ratio of 1.19 at 20 mbar.

data.question: What is the predicted methane uptake capacity of UiO(bpdc) at 293 K and 35 bar?
Is the adsorption of CO2 at 195 K on UiO(bpdc) stepwise?
Does UiO(bpdc) exhibit a higher CO2 uptake capacity compared to UiO-67?
What method was used to fully activate the as-synthesized sample of UiO(bpdc)?
What is the reason for the stepwise adsorption isotherms observed for UiO(bpdc)?
data.answer: The stepwise isotherms could be attributed to the sequential adsorption of sorbates on different adsorption sites.

data.question: Does the presence of bipyridyl sites in UiO(bpdc) contribute to its high gas storage capacities?
What is the crystal system of UiO(bpdc)?
What is the role of Soxhlet-extraction in the activation of UiO(bpdc)?
data.answer: Soxhlet-extraction is used to fully evacuate the as synthesized sample by extracting the high boiling point solvents and other compounds involved in the framework.

data.question: Is the thermal stability of UiO(bpdc) comparable to UiO-66?
What is the formula weight of UiO(bpdc)?
What is the significance of the bipyridyl moieties in UiO(bpdc)?
data.answer: The bipyridyl moieties act as free Lewis basic sites, enhancing gas uptake capacities without sacrificing the original high porosity and exceptional robustness of the framework.

data.question: Does UiO(bpdc) show a higher H2 uptake at 77 K and 20 bar compared to NOTT-102?
What is the unit cell parameter a for UiO(bpdc)?
Can the stepwise adsorption isotherms for UiO(bpdc) be explained by pore expansion and contraction?
What is the calculated Langmuir surface area of UiO(bpdc)?
What is the role of benzoic acid in the synthesis of UiO(bpdc)?
data.answer: Benzoic acid was added as the modulate agent in the synthesis of MOF UiO(bpdc).
